content.query:
--external table

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.categoria (
	[ID_CATEGORIA] int,
	[NOME_CATEGORIA] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'bronze/categoria/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [treinamento_adlstrn001_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM bronze.categoria
GO
